mapper.update: UPDATE teacher_absence SET absence_end = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s') WHERE attendance_no = #{attendanceNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher_absence ( attendance_no, category_no, absence_start, absence_day) VALUES ( #{attendanceNo}, '1', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
mapper.select: select teacher_absence.absence_no AS absenceNo, teacher_absence.attendance_no AS attendanceNo, teacher_absence.category_no AS categoryNo, teacher_absence.absence_start AS absenceStart, teacher_absence.absence_end AS absenceEnd, teacher_absence.absence_day AS absenceDay from teacher_absence inner join teacher_attendance on teacher_attendance.attendance_no = teacher_absence.attendance_no and teacher_attendance.attendance_no = #{teacherNo}

select teacher_attendance.attendance_no as attendanceNo, teacher_attendance.attendance_start as attendanceStart, teacher_attendance.attendance_end as attendanceEnd, teacher_attendance.attendance_day as attendanceDay, teacher.teacher_name as teacherName from teacher_attendance left join teacher on teacher_attendance.attendance_no = teacher.teacher_no where teacher_attendance.teacher_no = #{teacherNo} and teacher_attendance.attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher_attendance SET attendance_end=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s') WHERE teacher_no=#{teacherNo} and attendance_day=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
mapper.select: select attendance_end from teacher_attendance where teacher_no = #{teacherNo} and attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
